pricingPolicyModule.text: We strive to provide you with the lowest prices possible on Walmart.com as well as in our stores. However, sometimes a price online does not match the price in a store. Walmart.com's prices may be either higher or lower than local store prices. Prices may also vary between stores. Our local stores do not honor Walmart.com pricing or competitor advertisements from outside of a store's local trade territory.

productInformationModule.HTML_SHELF: Opera Button, Applique & Neckroll Pillow, Set of Three
productInformationModule.shortDescription: Sumptuous set of three glamorous pillows to match the Opera Comforter Set.  Lounge in comfort and style on your bed.
productInformationModule.HTML:
Sumptuous set of three glamorous pillows to match the Opera Comforter Set. Lounge in comfort and style on your bed.

  • Three pillows, two square and one neckroll
  • Matches Opera Comforter Set
  • Face: 70% polyester / 30% Cotton
  • Back: 100% Polyester
  • Fill: 450 grams poly blow fill

components.shortDescription: Adorable Black and Cream pillow with center buttons adds a touch of tailored whimsy to your bed. This decorative bed pillow is one among the two square and one neck roll pillows that coordinate with each other. The Opera Button Dec Pillow 18x18" makes a perfect match to the luxurious Opera Comforter Set for a complete look. This opera pillow is soft and comfortable, making it functional, yet, fashionable.
components.longDescription:
Opera Button Dec Pillow 18x18":
  • Measurements: 18x18" square pillow
  • Matches Opera Comforter Set
  • Face: 70% polyester / 30% Cotton
  • Back: 100% Polyester
  • Fill: 450 grams poly blow fill
